text: 18|57|evan tan iraivanin vacanankal otik kanpikkappatta camayattil avarraip purakkanittu, tan kaikalal ceyta kurrankalai (murrilum) marantu vitukirano avanaivita aniyayakkaran yar? (Inta aniyayakkararkal) etaiyum arintu kollatavaru nam avarkalutaiya ullankalil tiraiyaiyum, avarkalutaiya katukalil mantattaiyum niccayamaka akkivittom. Atalal, (napiye!) Nir avarkalai nerana valiyil (evvalavutan varunti) alaittapotilum oru kalattilum avarkal nerana valikku varave mattarkal
